breakfastPizza.name: Breakfast Pizza
breakfastPizza.description: A delicious breakfast pizza for the adventurous sort. Who knew Hardboiled egg slices would be so delicious on pizza!

cheesePizza.name: Cheese Pizza
cheesePizza.description: A classic cheese pizza made with the finest quality ingredients for the minimalistic individual.

mushroomBites.name: Mushroom Bites
mushroomBites.description: Deliciously baked pizza squares topped with the finest mushrooms available.

pepperoniCheese.name: Pepperoni and Cheese
pepperoniCheese.description: The classic pepperoni and cheese combo baked to perfection in our state of the art pizza oven.

sausagePizza.name: Sausage Pizza
sausagePizza.description: A fine pizza topped with quality sausage bits. Perfect for the carnivorous individual.

vegetarianPizza.name: Vegetarian Pizza
vegetarianPizza.description: A pizza made for the vegetarian individual. Topped with all kinds of vegie staples!
